WorkItem.Description: All bonuses go to NaN when you add Soul Fire to the last spell cast in spell rotation.  If added in any other slot - no data is shown at all.  This is a critical spell in the rotation for Demonic Spec.
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] Soul Fire for Demonic Spec causing NaN

Comments.Message: Just curious, as a warlock myself, I hope you are not using this in a rotation other then during Decimation.. Otherwise, just check the box for Decimate at 1-35% HP.

Also note that the effect is now timed (rather than being consumed by the next attack), and that it is procced by SoulFire itself. As a result, Soul Fire can be spammed after 35%. Though it's likely you are already aware of all that, it was worth making sure :).

Yes - using it during decimation only.  Clicking the Decimation box doesn't account for the spell in the rotation though. 

There is a new bug since 3.3 in game (not with this program) - Soul Fire has to be completely cast before timer expires otherwise it does consume a soul shard.  Prior to patch as long as you started cast - no shard was consumed.  Only matters when switching targets.
